languages.text: "Среди горстки выживших была одна сирота, видевшая, как погибли все родные ее и дотла сгорел сад, в котором она росла. Но в сердце своем она знала главную истину, что умещается в два слова — Император защищает. И, зная это, не отрываясь, глядела она в черное, страшное, затянутое дымом пожаров небо. Не разглядеть больше было на нем ярких звезд... кроме одной".

traits.locale_text: "Среди горстки выживших была одна сирота, видевшая, как погибли все родные ее и дотла сгорел сад, в котором она росла. Но в сердце своем она знала главную истину, что умещается в два слова — Император защитит. И, зная это, не отрываясь, глядела она в черное, страшное, затянутое дымом пожаров небо. Не разглядеть больше было на нем ярких звезд… кроме одной".

languages.text: "Among the handful of survivors was one orphan who had watched all her family die and the garden she'd grown up in burn to ash. But in her heart, she knew the absolute truth, just these three words — the Emperor protects. And knowing that, she never looked away from the black, terrifying, smoke-covered sky. There were no more bright stars to be seen... except for one."
languages.original_text: "Среди горстки выживших была одна сирота, видевшая, как погибли все родные ее и дотла сгорел сад, в котором она росла. Но в сердце своем она знала главную истину, что умещается в два слова — Император защищает. И, зная это, не отрываясь, глядела она в черное, страшное, затянутое дымом пожаров небо. Не разглядеть больше было на нем ярких звезд... кроме одной".

But in her heart, she knew the absolute truth, just these three words — the Emperor protects. And knowing that, she never looked away from the black, terrifying, smoke-covered sky. But in her heart, she knew the absolute truth, just these three words — the Emperor protects. And knowing that, she never looked away from the black, terrifying, smoke-covered sky. There were no more bright stars to be seen... except for one."

languages.text: “在为数不多的幸存者中，有一个孤儿。她所有家人都死在了她面前，她从小到大长大的花园化为了灰烬。但在她心中，她恪守着绝对的真理，那就是——帝皇会保佑祂的人民。怀着这样的信念，她紧紧地盯着被烟尘覆盖的阴暗天空。可怕的天空中，明亮的星星全都销声匿迹了……只有一颗还在。”
languages.original_text: "Among the handful of survivors was one orphan who had watched all her family die and the garden she'd grown up in burn to ash. But in her heart, she knew the absolute truth, just these three words — the Emperor protects. And knowing that, she never looked away from the black, terrifying, smoke-covered sky. There were no more bright stars to be seen... except for one."

traits.locale_text: “在为数不多的幸存者中，有一个孤儿。她所有家人都死在了她面前，她从小到大长大的花园化为了灰烬。但在她心中，她恪守着绝对的真理，那就是——帝皇会保佑祂的人民。怀着这样的信念，她紧紧地盯着被烟尘覆盖的阴暗天空。可怕的天空中，明亮的星星全都销声匿迹了……只有一颗还在。”

languages.original_text: "Among the handful of survivors was one orphan who had watched all her family die and the garden she'd grown up in burn to ash. But in her heart, she knew the absolute truth, just these three words — the Emperor protects. And knowing that, she never looked away from the black, terrifying, smoke-covered sky. There were no more bright stars to be seen... except for one."

languages.text: «Entre el puñado de supervivientes había una huérfana que vio morir a toda su familia y contempló cómo el jardín donde había crecido quedaba reducido a cenizas. Pero en su corazón sabía una verdad absoluta, compuesta por tres palabras: el Emperador protege. Sabiendo eso, no apartó la mirada del aterrador cielo negro cubierto de humo. No quedaban estrellas que ver... excepto una única estrella».
languages.original_text: "Among the handful of survivors was one orphan who had watched all her family die and the garden she'd grown up in burn to ash. But in her heart, she knew the absolute truth, just these three words — the Emperor protects. And knowing that, she never looked away from the black, terrifying, smoke-covered sky. There were no more bright stars to be seen... except for one."

traits.locale_text: «Entre el puñado de supervivientes había una huérfana que vio morir a toda su familia y contempló cómo el jardín donde había crecido quedaba reducido a cenizas. Pero en su corazón sabía una verdad absoluta, compuesta por tres palabras: el Emperador protege. Sabiendo eso, no apartó la mirada del aterrador cielo negro cubierto de humo. No quedaban estrellas que ver... excepto una única estrella».

languages.text: 「一握りの生存者の中に、家族全員が死に、育った庭が灰燼に帰すのを目の当たりにした孤児がいた。しかし、彼女は心の中で、この真実を告げる言葉を知っていた…皇帝がお守りくださる、と。それを知っていたからこそ、彼女は黒く、恐ろしく、煙に覆われた空から目をそらすことはなかった。そこにはもう明るい星は見えなかった…ただひとつを除いて」
languages.original_text: "Among the handful of survivors was one orphan who had watched all her family die and the garden she'd grown up in burn to ash. But in her heart, she knew the absolute truth, just these three words — the Emperor protects. And knowing that, she never looked away from the black, terrifying, smoke-covered sky. There were no more bright stars to be seen... except for one."

traits.locale_text: 「一握りの生存者の中に、家族全員が死に、育った庭が灰燼に帰すのを目の当たりにした孤児がいた。しかし、彼女は心の中で、この真実を告げる言葉を知っていた…皇帝がお守りくださる、と。それを知っていたからこそ、彼女は黒く、恐ろしく、煙に覆われた空から目をそらすことはなかった。そこにはもう明るい星は見えなかった…ただひとつを除いて」

languages.text: "Unter den wenigen Überlebenden befand sich auch ein Waisenkind, ein Mädchen. Sie hatte mitangesehen, wie ihre gesamte Familie gestorben war, wie der Garten ihrer Kindheit eingeäschert worden war. Doch in ihrem Herzen kannte sie die absolute Wahrheit, nur diese drei Wörter — der Imperator beschützt. Und da sie dies wusste, nahm sie den Blick nie vom schwarzen, furchterregenden, rauchverhangenen Himmel. Es waren keine strahlenden Sterne mehr zu sehen ... bis auf einen."
languages.original_text: "Among the handful of survivors was one orphan who had watched all her family die and the garden she'd grown up in burn to ash. But in her heart, she knew the absolute truth, just these three words — the Emperor protects. And knowing that, she never looked away from the black, terrifying, smoke-covered sky. There were no more bright stars to be seen... except for one."

traits.locale_text: "Unter den wenigen Überlebenden befand sich auch ein Waisenkind, ein Mädchen. Sie hatte mitangesehen, wie ihre gesamte Familie gestorben war, wie der Garten ihrer Kindheit eingeäschert worden war. Doch in ihrem Herzen kannte sie die absolute Wahrheit, nur diese drei Wörter — der Imperator beschützt. Und da sie dies wusste, nahm sie den Blick nie vom schwarzen, furchterregenden, rauchverhangenen Himmel. Es waren keine strahlenden Sterne mehr zu sehen ... bis auf einen."

languages.text: « Parmi les rares survivants se trouvait une orpheline qui avait vu toute sa famille se faire tuer et le jardin dans lequel elle avait grandi être réduit en cendres. Mais au plus profond de son cœur, elle connaissait la vérité absolue, qui se composait de ces trois mots : l'Empereur protège. Sachant cela, elle ne détourna pas un seul instant les yeux de ce ciel noir et terrifiant envahi par la fumée. Plus aucune étoile ne brillait devant ses yeux... sauf une. »
languages.original_text: "Among the handful of survivors was one orphan who had watched all her family die and the garden she'd grown up in burn to ash. But in her heart, she knew the absolute truth, just these three words — the Emperor protects. And knowing that, she never looked away from the black, terrifying, smoke-covered sky. There were no more bright stars to be seen... except for one."

traits.locale_text: « Parmi les rares survivants se trouvait une orpheline qui avait vu toute sa famille se faire tuer et le jardin dans lequel elle avait grandi être réduit en cendres. Mais au plus profond de son cœur, elle connaissait la vérité absolue, qui se composait de ces trois mots : l'Empereur protège. Sachant cela, elle ne détourna pas un seul instant les yeux de ce ciel noir et terrifiant envahi par la fumée. Plus aucune étoile ne brillait devant ses yeux... sauf une. »

languages.text: "Geriye kalan bir avuç insanın arasında ailesinin ölümüne ve çocukluğunun geçtiği bahçenin küle dönüşüne tanıklık eden bir öksüz varmış. Fakat bu öksüz, yüreğinde şu iki kelimeden oluşan hakikati taşıyormuş: İmparator korur. Bu hakikati bilen öksüz kız; o kara, dehşet verici, dumanlı semalardan gözünü hiç kaçırmamış. Gökyüzündeki parlak yıldızlardan eser kalmamış... Biri hariç."
languages.original_text: "Among the handful of survivors was one orphan who had watched all her family die and the garden she'd grown up in burn to ash. But in her heart, she knew the absolute truth, just these three words — the Emperor protects. And knowing that, she never looked away from the black, terrifying, smoke-covered sky. There were no more bright stars to be seen... except for one."

traits.locale_text: "Geriye kalan bir avuç insanın arasında ailesinin ölümüne ve çocukluğunun geçtiği bahçenin küle dönüşüne tanıklık eden bir öksüz varmış. Fakat bu öksüz, yüreğinde şu iki kelimeden oluşan hakikati taşıyormuş: İmparator korur. Bu hakikati bilen öksüz kız, o kara ve dehşet veren dumanlı semalardan gözünü hiç kaçırmamış. Ama gökyüzündeki parlak yıldızlardan eser kalmamış... biri hariç."
